author: cnbc.com
title: Leaf Group to Announce First Quarter 2018 Financial Results on May 8, 2018
text:
SANTA MONICA, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Leaf Group Ltd. (NYSE: LFGR), a diversified consumer Internet company comprised of several marketplace and media properties, today announced it will report its first quarter 2018 financial results after market close on May 8, 2018. Leaf Group will also host a conference call to discuss the results at 4:30 p.m. Eastern Time (1:30 p.m. Pacific Time) on the same day.
Leaf Group Ltd. First Quarter 2018 Earnings Conference Call
Tuesday, May 8, 2018 4:30 p.m. Eastern / 1:30 p.m. Pacific Please dial (833) 287-0803 (US/CAN) or (647) 689-4462 (International) to listen to the call. The conference ID is 2295616. A replay of the Conference call is available through May 15, 2018: (800) 585-8367 (US/CAN) or (416) 621-4642 (International) You may also visit the Leaf Group Investor Relations Homepage at ir.leafgroup.com to listen to a live webcast of the call.
The earnings webcast will be archived within the Investor Relations section of Leaf Group’s website.
About Leaf Group
Leaf Group Ltd. (NYSE: LFGR) is a diversified consumer internet company that builds enduring, creator-driven brands that reach passionate audiences in large and growing lifestyle categories, including art and design (Saatchi Art), fitness and wellness ( Livestrong.com ), home and décor (Society6 and Hunker), do-it-yourself projects and crafts (eHow). For more information about Leaf Group, visit www.leafgroup.com .
